text: Richard Randall Rollins (November 5, 1931 - August 17, 2020) was an American billionaire businessman. He was the chairman of Rollins Inc., the US's largest pest control company. He was born in Ringgold, Georgia. He was also chairman of Marine Products Corporation, and RPC, Inc and a director of Dover Downs Gaming and Entertainment, Inc, and Dover Motorsports. As of August 2020, Forbes his net worth at US$5.1 billion. Rollins died on August 17, 2020, aged 88. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American billionaires Category:Businesspeople from Georgia (U.S. state)
title: Randall Rollins
